testcase.name: enrollment pop up using category
testcase.system-out: Given user is on edureka Homepage...........................................passed When user click on DevOps Category..........................................passed When user click on Devps certification course...............................passed When user has click on enroll button........................................passed Then user should see enroll pop.............................................passed

testcase.name: Search using Keyword and go to course page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on edureka Homepage...........................................passed When user tap on search screen..............................................passed When user enter "power Bi" in search bar and click..........................passed And user should see list of courses related to the power bi.................passed And user tap on the course Micosoft powerBi Certification Training Course...passed Then user should be on course page..........................................passed

testcase.name: To get help in enrolling
testcase.system-out: Given user is in Edureka Homepage...........................................passed When user tap click on search screen........................................passed When user enter "Cloud Architect Course - Masters Program" on search bar and click.passed And user tap on the course Cloud Architect Course - Masters Program.........passed And user click on get in touch button.......................................passed Then user will get a popup..................................................passed

testcase.name: search using course name and read review - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user is in Edureka Homepage...........................................passed When user click on search screen............................................passed When user enter "PMP Certification Training Course" in search bar...........passed When web page is redirected to the course page and click on review..........passed Then reviews will be displayed..............................................passed

testcase.name: unable to login during enrollment
testcase.system-out: Given user is on edureka Homepage...........................................passed When user select on know more it is redirected to course page...............passed When user click on login button to enroll...................................passed When user give username.....................................................passed When user click on login....................................................passed Then it shows a error message...............................................passed
